title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Pastor Tony Spell | 3/20/20
description:
The mainstream media have been effectively parroting Chinese propaganda with their incessant condemnation of the term "Chinese virus." Bill O’Reilly joins the program to discuss the economic ramifications of businesses being shuttered and where the tipping point for Trump’s re-election might be. The issue of government closing gathering places is on full display in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. Pastor Tony Spell joins the program to share the story of the fight to keep his church open.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
